thread.title: Florida Girls
thread.title_full: Peaches Boutique reviewed by Florida Girls

author: Florida Girls
title: Florida Girls
text: I have ordered from Peaches several times and each time the experience has been positive. Even when I had to return or exchange an item, the process always went smoothly. I really like that you can exchange a dress at no charge. If you have to outright return something, there is a service charge, but at least you have that option. Most places don't allow returns, period. Again, we have been very happy over the years with this company.
